candidates.name: Tania Mcinnes
candidates.why_elect: 40 of my 50 years living in the Far North. Almost six years as deputy mayor, a previous five years working within LG. I know its challenges and I know its potential. Highly experienced governance individual, renowned as a strategic thinker, with a strong background in community development.
candidates.why_stand: I am daring greatly, putting a stake in the ground for our people and our place. I hold a clear vision and believe my inclusive leadership style, knowledge and courageous approach will make a genuine difference now and in the future. Na tatou to wa—it's our time!

candidates.name: Harko Brown
candidates.why_elect: I have a vast governance experience working on national organisation boards and local club boards and with international organisations and iwi runanga. I am a team player who can motivate and enthuse management/governance teams and have a proven track record of innovation.
candidates.why_stand: Our region has generous open-hearted people, beautiful scenery and extraordinarily rich histories but needs an in-tune council to capitalise on that aroha, beauty and richness to develop our region into one that is unified, vibrant, safe to live, work and play in, and resilient. I can lead that movement.

candidates.name: Dave Bear Hookway
candidates.why_elect: University educated, street smart and previous business owner, I've achieved results at all levels. I've confronted issues, working locally and nationally to promote, develop and implement policies that place community first, both in community public health for and as your councillor.
candidates.why_stand: Martin Luther King once said "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." Voted onto council to fight for accountability and transparency, I've given voice to the serious concerns you've raised about council and its increasing disconnect with community. Let's fix our council.

candidates.name: Monty Knight
candidates.why_elect: I have lived and worked in the district my whole life—and I am one of it's greatest supporters. It is growing fast—and I would like all our residents to benefit from this growth. My life has been about leading projects both in business and governance.
candidates.why_stand: I have business and governance leadership skills and experience that I would like to use for the betterment of our district. We have discontent and dysfunction within council—with good leadership I would like to restore citizens faith in our council, let's put things right.
